text:
Just stumbled on this today: <https://teleport.org/cities/houston/>
It's a pretty interesting example of dashboard design combining some static and dynamic visualizations. Also, with some really basic similarity matrices, they've got a cool "city-comparison-index" here: <https://teleport.org/2016/02/visualizing-city-similarity/>

attachments.title: Houston - Teleport Cities
attachments.text: Houston, Texas, is among the top cities with a free business environment. According to our city rankings, this is a good place to live with high ratings in Startups, Venture Capital and Healthcare. Log in to see personalized match scores, salary and cost of living comparisons. Houston is one of the top ten city matches for 0.6% of Teleport users.

attachments.title: Visualizing city similarity - Teleport
attachments.text: This blog post explains an alternative way to figure out how similar cities are. After you read it, you will realize why I think Madison and Reykjavik are very similar cities.   Teleport Cities allows you to research the most interesting cities in the world using a sophisticated scoring system that compares and contrasts them. …
